message.body: Hi, i txted you the bill info
Hi, i need to coordinate the truck w other ppl. Can we do kitchen at 1? Thanks

Hi, i think i took al my stuff and came to download, and forgot to go over bills w u. One thing i dont understand, is why it says G owes 40 for internet. I think g covers you and ria? If so, The internet bills were 60 per month for nov and dec. so thats 120 total. Divided by 3 = 40 per person. So wouldnt each of you owe 40? If you prefer to go over this in person let me know
You forgot your gloves and knives, and yes id rather go over it in person
Ok, i need to finish unloading. Can we do it in 20?
N thanks for gloves and knives
